name: Pricebook2
description: Represents a price book that lists the prices of products that your organization sells.
summary:
The `{Pricebook2}` object in Salesforce is a standard object used to manage price books, which are collections of products and their associated prices. This object contains various attributes that provide details about each price book. Here is a summary of its attributes:

- **Id (id)**: A unique identifier for the price book.
- **IsDeleted (boolean)**: Indicates whether the price book has been deleted.
- **Name (string)**: The name of the price book.
- **CreatedDate (datetime)**: The date and time when the price book was created.
- **CreatedById (reference)**: The ID of the user who created the price book.
- **LastModifiedDate (datetime)**: The date and time when the price book was last modified.
- **LastModifiedById (reference)**: The ID of the user who last modified the price book.
- **SystemModstamp (datetime)**: The date and time when the price book was last modified by the system.
- **LastViewedDate (datetime)**: The date and time when the price book was last viewed.
- **LastReferencedDate (datetime)**: The date and time when the price book was last referenced by a user or process.
- **IsActive (boolean)**: Indicates whether the price book is active.
- **IsArchived (boolean)**: Indicates whether the price book is archived.
- **Description (string)**: A description of the price book.
- **IsStandard (boolean)**: Indicates whether the price book is the standard price book.

These attributes help in tracking the status, ownership, activity, and characteristics of price books within a Salesforce instance.
label: Price Book
